short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List down your goals and see them appear whenever you open new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add your goals for the year as bold highlighted tabs. See them come up whenever you open a new tab. 
All your goals are stored using Chrome's storage and synced across devices. Goals doesn't save any of your data on it's end.
